description: Our client, a vertically integrated, publicly traded cannabis company is hiring a new Accounts Payable Manager. The Accounts Payable Manager will play a crucial role in Leading the accounts payable and disbursement activities. This includes the processing and monitoring payments, managing vendor relationships, reconciling accounts, and generating financial reports.
responsibilities:
Lead the company's Treasury function, including cash and accounts payable departments
Oversee and manager daily cash management operations, including daily cash flow, forecasting, manage the cash position, including transfer of funds and banking relationships.
Process and monitor payments
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize financial performance, identify cost-saving opportunities, and drive operational efficiencies.
Manage vendor relationships
Reconcile and analyze accounts
Generate financial reports

qualifications.required:
BA/BS degree in Accounting or Finance or a related field.
At least 7 years of experience in corporate treasury or finance roles, with a focus on cash management and accounts payable.
Prior experience in the cannabis industry is highly desirable.
Proficient working knowledge of Microsoft Word and Excel.
